name: Left to Rot
description:
Left to Rot is a first-person psychological horror game.

Explore an atmospheric world, that combines surreal events and realistic environments, and enjoy a truly terrifying and spine-chilling experience.

Storyline & Environments


Imagine rushing to arrive at work, and instead of getting there safer, you produce a fatal car crash that completely changes your life. After a few years of psychological recovery, you decide it's better to move out into a new city and into a new house. This house is stained with a terrible past!



Characters


Every character in Left to Rot has its own story that blends with the main narrative.



Enemies


Watch every step you make and be careful, you do not want to attract any unwanted attention. You're not alone in there.



Gameplay


Use your phone's flashlight, to navigate in the dark.



Find video tapes and unravel the mysteries.




Explore and find items that could help you throughout the journey.



Use the inventory to store, combine, bind and arrange items.



Game Features:


• Psychedelic horror – A sense of insanity means each turn of the camera may completely change the look of your surroundings.
• Immersive sound design - Each sound was carefully crafted to keep you immersed in the environment.
• Exploration based gameplay - Explore surreal zones and find out key items to complete objectives and find more dark story.
